page.title: 15Jobs in New Milton
page.content: Our D-Block is a very popular holiday and retirement area.Many of the jobs are connected with the holiday industry such as jobs in cafes,restaurants,pubs,hotels,campsite s.Many of the jobs are seasonal and last only through the summer.There are a large number of jobs which are services for retired people in this area.Also there are a large number of small building firms and associated trades like plumbing,electricity,which have grown with the explosion of building in this area in the last ten years.Travel to Bournemouth and Southampton is very easy by road and rail so many people commute to these towns for work.Most school leavers either find work or go on to college or work on Employment schemes.Unemployment is less than the national average in this area.
